name: flash-extension
description: Flashcard Builder Chrome Extension with Gesture Detection

scripts.clean: powershell -NoProfile -Command "if (Test-Path dist) { Remove-Item -Recurse -Force dist }; New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path dist > $null"
scripts.build:ts: npm run clean && tsc && copy extension\manifest.json dist\manifest.json && copy extension\popup.html dist\popup.html && copy extension\gesture-page.html dist\gesture-page.html 2>$null
scripts.build: npm run build:ts && npm run build:gestures && npm run postbuild:extension
scripts.postbuild:extension: powershell -NoProfile -Command Copy-Item extension\*.css dist 2>$null; Copy-Item extension\*.js dist 2>$null;
